## Operaciones basicas

Las operaciones de matematicas, logicas y de asignacion

$$
\hat{x} = \frac{x}{x}
$$

```{r}
x = c(1:10, NaN, 10:-20, NaN, 27)
xi = sum(x)/length(x)
xi
```
```{r vectores con datos}
x1 = c(1:10, NaN, 10:-20, NaN, 27)
x1i = sum(x1, na.rm = TRUE)/length(x1)
x1i
```



```{r}
x = c(1:100)
xi = sum(x)/length(x)
xi
```
